data.message: I see a lot of little whinny bitches on here, with out one ounce of talent saying Eminem is washed up and old. Fuck the man has more talent and skill than all you fucks combined.

replies.message: More talent than a million critics? Doubtful. Some people play instruments.
How's that man's dick taste? Cuz you all the way down to his ballz
How do you know they don't have talent?
Because we're watching him on Facebook and we're just here commenting.
There's something true about that. It's like Eminem is stealing their money and Trump is giving them free gifts.
And yet this song is a fucking disaster..such a bad job by him AND Beyonce...
Kevin Mathuews we also watch honey boo on TV, and kim kartrashian.guess they have talent too, going by your retarded logic.
far from one of his better songs. Hes not washed up, but he couldve done better. Seems like his heart is out of it in this song cause it doesnt have the energy behind it like he usually has

Nobody listened to or read the lyrics to this song did they? You people are the reason he made it. He’s done trying to please people and he’s done with Shady and the mumble rap. Seriously you people are so out of touch with what the song actually means.

I’m not saying he’s washed up I’m saying this song didn’t sound good 
It didn’t! Lol 
Wtf is this shit?
God damn hypocrite come back EM!
No he WAS talented. Everything he has realeased in the last 5 years has been trash.

People are just mad cuz they cant comprehend his rhymes anymore. He's done being slim shady and he'll never be slim again because that's not him, that's what you people want him to be. His lyrics now are about meaning and depth something you dimwitted fucks know nothing about!
he has talent I agree. but this song is not
So people aren't allowed to have an opinion moron?
eminem fans are all stupid tards
